mapper.select: select D.device_no as deviceNo, D.customer_id as id, D.device_category_no as deviceCategoryNo, D.sell_date as sellDate, D.device_name as deviceName, D.device_rental as rental, C.device_category_product as deviceCategoryProduct from customer_devices D, device_categories C where D.customer_id = #{value} and D.device_category_no = C.device_category_no order by C.device_category_product desc
